CustomField.description: This lookup relationship is used to link a "Work Step" to a specific Service Appointment during the work step has been completed/answered. This is particularly important to link a "Schedule Item Code" work step to a Service Appointment, in order to identify what type of work a specific crew/subcontractor has done during their Service Appointment. Otherwise, the Work Steps are only linked to a Work Order or Work Order Line Item, making it impossible to tell on which Service Appointment the Work Step has been completed.
CustomField.label: Service Appointment
